question_text: Which of the following are valid behaviors of mobile operating systems when hotspot mode is enabled? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Phone automatically switches to airplane mode
Hotspot feature may automatically disable after inactivity
correct_answer: Hotspot feature may automatically disable after inactivity
explanation: Hotspot mode increases mobile data use, allows Wi-Fi connections, and often times out if no devices are connected. Airplane mode disables all radios, including hotspot.
